Bring it on! You aren't the first fighter I've faced down!
Fighting spirit might have gotten you this far, but it's no match for my natural gifts!
Big deal. My butt used to look like that. It's nothing special.
So what? I used to have a cute little butt too. Before I came to the human world, anyway...

Ya know... the holiest of all treasures! Pommes frites! Hranolky! Kentang goreng! French Fries!
Oh... I had no idea you were in such a precarious position...
Sorry, Meia... It's easy for me to forget that not everyone can afford to enjoy life to the fullest...
Oh no, Meia! The Human is doing his very best to help me lose weight. I'd probably be huge if it wasn't for his nagging.
You misunderstand the Human, Meia! He's working himself to the bone to try and help me slim down. It's... a tough job.
Finally, someone else who understands my struggle! So many people here seem to effortlessly avoid temptation...
If you're into nature near Tokyo, Meia... Hmmm, there's Yoyogi Park, the portal between worlds, and...Oh! Mt. Takao!
Your... prisoners? It's probably not a good idea to try to date people you're keeping as captives...

The portal's real, Meia. On one side, elven forest magic. On the other, human culinary magic.

condition.saying: I dunno if bein’ trapped ‘cause you ate too many fries is a case a’ bad luck. Couldn’t ya just, y’know, eat fries less?

case.state: I don't think you understand. These are fries we're talking about. You can't just choose to stop eating them.
Oh, no no no! Siren songs are bad news. Mermaids use them to trick you into falling in love with them!
Oh, you poor thing... No one should have to suffer like that. Potatoes should bring joy to all!

condition.saying: So where can I get some of these "fries" for myself?

case.state: These come from Bad Burger, but you can get fries at pretty much any fine restaurant.
Elf-san Wa Yaserarenai. It's a sobering look at an important real-life issue.

condition.saying: ♫ I like big butts and I can not lie / You other brothers can't deny / That when a girl walks in with an itty bitty waist / And a round thing in your face-- You get sprung~♫

case.state: An "itty bitty waist?" That's not fair! Big butts are big butts!
It wouldn't be concealed if I told you, silly! Although, I think you'd be surprised just how clever we elves can be...
Please, human. It's alright to admit you're interested in them. Don't tell me you asked for dating advice for purely academic purposes.
If nobody's watching, then no one will hear me say I'm actually an elf! Ha ha!
You'll make sure to only show me from flattering angles, right, Streaming-chan?
Oh, it's robust all right. The enemies always glow right before a big attack, so you might say I'm tactically educated.
Would dual sticks and actual vibrations count as a "robust?" It's pretty much real life.
I've got this, Faye! Since you're such a gambler, let's bet a medium... no a large order of fries that I win!
I love the human world, but I've got people back home waiting for me. My Auntie even came to bring me back herself! And got herself stuck...
Phew! I'm glad to hear even the good doctor isn't above a little holiday indulgence. See you in the gym come New Years?
Of course, Galatea! Some people just sit on the couch and watch TV in them, no sweat required!
That's... a very kind offer, Senko.
Ooooh! Tell me more about Hero's cooking...
He makes cookies for you? Does he ever make french fries?
Pfffft! Good one, Turandot! I know you'd miss my beautiful voice too much.
Ah ah ah Turandot! It's far too early for orders! If we hit it off, perhaps we can revisit the subject later.
Well of course not, Turandot! We've hardly met! I already know you for your wise and benevolent rule of "Two-For-One-Tuesdays!"
I guess I'll just have to win you over with my charm and grace, Turandot!
No, no, no, Turandot. I meant you'll never have to face the indignity of too-tight clothes. Just snap your fingers and let your tailors do the rest!
That's so thoughtful of you to think of your tailors, Turandot. But I meant to say they'd make things easier for you. You know... if a dress shrinks...

state.text: I'm sorry, Turandot. I know what it's like to see feelings around my waist...

case.state: Oh please, Turandot! You look perfectly fit to me!
Eh, I'll take what I can get get, Turandot.
I know what treats are, Turandot. I was wondering what you liked to treat yourself with!
Yum! Those dates sound delicious! You'll have to teach me what to pair with souls another time.

Ahh, uhh, two hund-...
Twenty years old!
How about you?
Say, Emi... what kind of diet does a track star follow? Are fries allowed?
Ooooh... Sounds like fun! But don't think I'm going to lose!
Be honest with me, Trainer... Do you think I need a new routine?
I've already got a personal trainer... but do you think I'm on the right track, Trainer?
I've been dieting for a while now, Trainer. Do I need to change my routine?
What do you think, Syrenne? Have I got the assets to be a good barmaid?

condition.saying: I sure hope my portal home doesn't have any rules like that... Though, I guess I don't foresee myself gaining weight anytime soon...

case.state: Well that's the thing, Aella. You can't predict weight gain. It just happens out of nowhere...

No one foresees weight gain. It sneaks up on you with absolutely no warning signs.
More golems? That fatass dark elf's magic must be spreading...
Ugh... another demon. The last demon I faced tricked me with a year's supply of fries!

condition.saying: So, could somebody please explain which hands are good again?

case.state: Let's see, Saki... big numbers are good, faces are even better! Oh, and it's good if they're matching somehow...
You think dying is rough? Try being trapped in another world by the very fries you love...
Ugh. Of course Commander Hardass has buns of steel...

condition.saying: Does this place serve food? I could get an appetizer for the table to share.

case.state: Now you're speaking my language, Pyrrha! I'll have the potato wedges.

A celebrity like you must have a killer fitness routine, right? I'm always looking for tips!
I'm uh... glad to hear you feel that way, Amy!
I mean... you can take a closer look if you want. I was kinda worried it was getting too big...
How about you, Amy? Are there any foreign cultures you're especially interested in?

I get lots of results! I just don't... keep them for very long.
Just be careful, Arash. I don't like to hold back when I'm training!
We'll see how happy you are to spar once we've gone a few rounds, Arash! I can be a lot to handle.
That's a strange thing to bring up out of the blue, Cynthia... but you do seem to be in excellent shape for a mother.
Don't worry, Cynthia. I'm sure you'd be much more motherly looking if you'd had a kid.
Say, Cynthia. What sort of Sinnoh cuisine would you recommend to a first time visitor?
Is it true what they say about Unova, Cynthia? That when you visit, you come back with a few extra kilos?
Oh! You have to try french fries! Just don't get stuck on this side of the portal...
The human world is nice! They've developed video games, but they still haven't figured out elven bows. There's a little magic, but not much.
Wait.. you're a demon!? Watch out, ~player~! Demons trick you into eating too many fries!
I'm not the one having a baby! I have to focus on the important things in life!
Just something to watch out for, Jura. I'm sure you'll look great in "mom jeans."
Just remember my warning when you wake up in the middle of the night craving something fried.

Coffee!? Intolerably bitter!
...Actually, I guess that suits you, Meia.
How can anyone stand coffee!? It's so bitter! Wait... that checks out.
Once upon a time, I heard the legend of the Golden Tassel. I braved many dangers and even crossed worlds, but it was worth it in the end.
Wait, couldn't you have slipped into a storage closet or something?

You know, Faye, I bet changing your weight would be a good way to hide from the authorities.
Sometimes I don't even recognize myself...
I... don't really do that kind of magic, Lux. I can't summon potatoes. But I can listen to plants!
Wow, Marceline! You're old! I'm just over two twenty myself!
Hmmm, I've only really been around Tokyo, but there are lots of fun places to get fries around! Or you could go to America. Or even France!

condition.saying: These cards are as good as my aunt's sweets!

case.state: Oooh, do tell, Mia! My Auntie's more into eating sweets than making them, so consider me jealous!
Do you... not get to see her much or something, Mia? Your waistline doesn't look like it's seen many sweets...
Awww, that's so sweet, Nami! Sometimes, the taste of fries reminds me that I can't go back home... because of fries.
Come on, Angela! What's the point of being a super-doctor if you're just gonna give lame advice like that? Don't you have a shrink-ray or something?
Of course you already ate, Angela. Lemme guess, a stick of celery and some lemon water?

Looking good isn't responsibility, Jura. Are you planning to flirt your way out of a 3am diaper change?
You're really scary, Meia! No wonder your girls tend to stay in shape!
Hmph! You know, Meia, some of your crew probably dream of the day when it's your turn to tip the scales!
Ugh... Of course Meia likes bland and tasteless foods. Let me guess, you just poach the fish and eat your toast plain?
Suuuure... Ms. Fitness Freak just happens to preside over a totally spontaneous shipwide weigh-in.

Don't you ever worry about how the... uh... "chubby girl" might feel about such a humiliating ritual?
And let me guess. You've never been the "chubby girl" yourself, have you?
I'm pretty sure the idea is to confuse your muscles by constantly changing your workout. Learning how to do an exercise means it won't work.
Well... The portal's stable but it won't let you back unless your weight is, too.

condition.saying: As exhausting as distance running is, training for it really saved me one time from a Deathstalker.

case.state: A Deathstalker... I guess I could dig out my running shoes and go for a quick jog... tomorrowish.

state.text: I get it, Pyrrha. You think I'm too fat to outrun monsters...

case.state: Phew! At least you agree those long runs are a pain!
Uhhh, what sort of alchemy is that, Sucrose?

condition.saying: A smile in the morning is as important as butter on toast!

case.state: Or ketchup on fries, right?
Oh wow! We're almost the same age!

case.state: That sounds great, Charlie! I can have some pretty strong feelings about pizza!

condition.saying: ...I've got to loosen up. My shoulders are tense, and my upper back feels tight.

case.state: If you're feeling stiff, Meia, we could drop by the Smiley Boar for massages. I'm sure the human will know how to take care of you.

condition.saying: I've trained animals for long enough that I know that gaining new skills takes time. ...And treats.

case.state: And just what, pray tell, does the mighty Turandot consider a treat?

condition.saying: Sometimes I feel it's all gone straight to my hips. Granted, a fully staffed kitchen team has helped to keep me rather trim, but it doesn't help that I can demand someone make a cake at any hour and they immediately start doing it.

case.state: You really don't have anything to worry about there, Turandot. Your hips look fine.
Ugh, Turandot... You sound a bit like me when I first came to the human world. It wasn't my imagination.
So much power and she's still in good shape! Turandot is amazing!
I'm glad to see I'm not the only warrior here tonight. Don't think I'll go easy on you though, Rinkah!
You know, my battle armor looks a bit like Rinkah's! I...haven't worn it in a while.
It's her, ~player~! Pumpkin Pete herself! From cereal!
Say, Faye, does being weightless mean you get to eat whatever you want without... you know... consequences?

I've noticed when you get chubbier than your doctor, they make you diet.
Say... want some fries, Angela?
Say, Angela. You don't happen to have any super secret tricks for losing weight without dieting, do you?
You're in pretty great shape for someone with a desk job, Mia... any secrets you'd be willing to divulge?
How can you find time to stay so fit, Mia? Do you have a stationary bike in your office or something?
You've got a pretty nice butt for someone who spends the workday sitting on it, Mia.

These are so good! I almost wouldn't mind if a demon forced me to eat them nonstop! Again!

You're from France! The holy country where they only eat fries!
You're from France... that means you must love fries like I do!

Anyone else have a food they just can't live without? I can't be the only one...
Would you believe a proud warrior like myself could succumb to temptation?
I've traveled across worlds to be here. So this game better not be a waste of time.
After I heard the legend of the Golden Tassel, I journeyed to the human world. Of course, my quest was a success.
I've seen some good bodies in my centuries, but I'm sure you'll all be fine.

condition.saying: Well... I wouldn't really say that I have a food I can't live without, but I did recently discoverer a delicacy called shaved ice while visiting a hotrealm. Perhaps you've heard of such a thing?

case.state: If you see this, please file a bug report!
If you see this, please submit a bug report!

condition.saying: Yeah, Chocolate! You wouldn't believe the things we had to do to get it while in prison, Erufuda.

case.state: If you see this, please file a bug report!

condition.saying: Gonna take a wild guess and say you're gonna whip that bra of yours off.
Gonna take a wild guess and say you're gonna whip that bra of yours off. Think I'm gonna enjoy getting a better look at those boobs of yours.

case.state: Well... since you asked so nicely...

condition.saying: Pointy ears and a...robust constitution. You remind me of the Supreme Kai.

condition.saying: I take it you're looking to lose a few pounds. Well, I bet I could help ya there, if you can keep up. Think you can handle my kinda workout?

Please. You're talking to a fitness expert. I'm sure I can handle your little workout.

condition.saying: I wonder if ~name~ has a cute butt.

case.state: Of course I have a cute butt! I'm not a fatass like Kuroeda.

condition.saying: If you take extra off I'll give you a rice cracker.

case.state: My dignity is worth more than a rice cracker! It'd take potatoes or some other treasure to win me over.

I used to be a toned warrior like you, but then I discovered the human world and its dangerously addictive french fries...
I... um... yes. Human men do prefer a woman with curves! Sorry to break it to you.
You know what? Yes. Human men consider "thicc" to be the ideal female form.
I see you don't have much experience with human men. They tend to like a woman with a little extra.

condition.saying: Wohoho, Wide Load comin' through. Did the bar hire you to make us all feel better about ourselves? Goddamn.

case.state: We'll see who's feeling better when this is all over! Watch out! I have excellent self-esteem!

case.state: I'm so sorry to hear that, Revy. I'll always think you're beautiful no matter how fat you get.

condition.saying: Damn, I was wondering what that earthquake was all about! Tons-a-Fun here must've been waddling over. We can already see everything, honey.

case.state: Ha ha ha... And I guess the warning siren was the sound of your voice.

condition.saying: Well, aren't you the biggest target I've ever seen? There's fat, and then there's literally stuffing your fuckin' face while your gut spills out.

Well, I guess the Huma...Naoe-kun is that kind of friend to me.

condition.saying: Did you really have to be eating while we're playing? At least have some dignity--I can see crumbs on your cheek.

What good is a striptease without something to eat while you watch? It'd be totally lame!

case.state: Would you prefer if I was wearing a black dress like yours?

condition.saying: Oh, good, we'll get to see even more fat on display. The least you could do is not shovel more fries in your face while it happens.

Please. I'm practically wasting away already. A few more weeks of dieting and I'll have my abs back.

As if I'd lose to you...
When I win, you'll have to buy me a family-sized box of fries from Bad Burger.

condition.saying: W-wait, w-wait, you like j-junk f-food too?! W-what’s your favorite!?

case.state: Fries can be a snack, right, Tomoko?

condition.saying: Yeah, I don’t know why I’m not a fat ass yet. I eat so much...

condition.saying: I'm almost kind of jealous. I've never been able to put on any weight, which sucks. Who doesn't love thick thighs?

Unbelievable! It sounds like the press cares more about your image than your fighting spirit!
Hmmm... I think I'd use the money to buy fries. Oh! And hire a bunch of trainers to keep me in shape.

state.text: Hmmm, I guess that's true... I am supposed to be cutting back on my fry intake...

Well, I'm technically on a diet, Senko, but I don't think pampering counts!
This is about my stupid pants, right, Senko? I told you, I've just been doing lots of workouts!
After suffering the embarrassment of ripping my pants in front of everyone!? I think some comfort food is required!
Easy for you to say, Samus! You're hiding your figure inside that... tank thing!
Oh no! Does bounty hunting not pay enough for you to afford food?
What's the matter, Samus? Jealous that I get to enjoy life while you're out freezing your butt off on some asteroid?
"Worse!?!" I'll have you know elves have far superior metabolisms, thank you very much!
Rude! Elven metabolisms are amazing! Much better than those puny humans!
Oh, come on, Hu Tao. Aren't you blowing things a little out of proportion? Look! I can almost suck it in!
Hu Tao! How dare you! Now every time I go to Bad Burger I'll remember you and your stupid death talk! Total mood killer!

A what? I-I uh... no, you see I...
I'm on a diet, OK!
You're right, Hu Tao. What's the point of lying to myself any more? ~Player~? Go get me an extra large order of fries.
Alright, Hu Tao! That's it! I'm starting a new diet right now! Somebody take these away from me!
Bad Burger! The perfect balance of oil and salt really brings out the potato flavor!

condition.saying: This is the fate of anyone who meets me. I am icy, cold nothingness personified.

case.state: Awww, you don't seem so bad, Turandot. I bet we could have a fun girl's night sometime!
You're too cute, Cat Noir. Hold that thought for me, would you?
We all know you're cheating, Mr. Fate! I hope the sight of my beautiful chest is worth it!
You're too kind, Mr. Fate.

condition.saying: ...I'm not impressed with this introduction to "elves." You should take better care of yourself.
...I assume "pudgy" is not the natural build of elven girls. How did you let yourself get in such a sorry condition?
...You must understand that Mejarian culture values slenderness. Maybe elves are different...or you're just undisciplined.
What a grotesque figure. Excess fat everywhere...are all elves like this, Erufuda?

case.state: Elves are tall and slender! Don't you know anything!?
How dare you? We elves take pride in our naturally elegant figures! I'm just... uh... working on mine!
If you must know, elves are naturally tall and slim. My figure has fallen to the magic of french fries...
Elves are tall and slender. We have to be, running through the hills and valleys like we do. My condition is the human world's fault.

condition.saying: You can't go home until you slim down?

case.state: Well you see... the portal between worlds requires things to be the same weight both ways...
Oh, I'll run your stupid race. It'll be fun seeing a human lose to an elf!

condition.saying: So you're really into your cosplay, huh...?

case.state: Cosplay? I'll have you know this is my actual workout outfit from the real gym where I regularly work out!
Cosplay? Are you saying you think I'm some kind of pretend fitness fanatic? I'm the real deal!

condition.saying: Let's see how your body compares to mine. I swim almost daily, by the way.

case.state: Bold of a human to think she can compare with an elf...
You might swim a lot, Misty, but I try a new workout almost every week.
She thinks swimming can let a human rival an elf!

condition.saying: Time for a real woman to strip... (More real than me, at least...)

case.state: You know what they say, Natsuki. "Real women have curves!"

condition.saying: Something smells good... are those... french fries?

case.state: I'm glad to see I'm not the only one who loves the smell of fresh fries!

condition.saying: Hey... can I, y'know... have some of those?

case.state: I guess you can have a few, Pit... if you promise to buy me a refill later!

condition.saying: You can probably use those fries as a layer! Like, not individually, but I could see weirder options being used.

case.state: I would never give up my fries... that would be cheating!

condition.saying: How much do you even weigh, Erufuda? You're going to have a lot of cardiac problems in the future.

case.state: Jeez. And who are you to lecture me? Some kind of doctor or something?
So I'm a little curvy. That doesn't mean you can just casually demand to know my weight!

condition.saying: Jeez, your cholesterol must be as high as the clouds, if you don't stop you're going to have serious problems, Erufuda.

case.state: Cholesterol. Hmph. You sound just like my personal trainer.
And who appointed you to be my dietician, Maki? An idol's "amphetamines and lemon water" diet isn't any healthier.

condition.saying: I know that some people complain about the beauty standards, but in your case it's really unhealthy, Erufuda.

case.state: That sounds exactly like what someone obsessed with beauty standards would say, Maki.
Oh, boo hoo. So I can't fit into one of those toddler-sized schoolgirl uniforms you idols wear.

condition.saying: I understand your efforts trying to move up to the heavyweight division, Erufuda, but you can stop eating fries. I mean, they're not even that good.

case.state: How dare you! French fries are a sacred food!
"Not that good?" Have you even tried french fries!?

condition.saying: Look at the color of those fries, I'm sure that a Geiger counter would be bleeping by now.

case.state: Don't worry, Maki. I counted the fries when I got them. There's nothing to worry about.

condition.saying: Can I help you with something, Erufuda? A drink? A burger? Maybe some sauce for the fries? Seriously, why did you even bring that food, I don't get it.

case.state: Hmmm... I could go for a soda as long as you're buying.
You see, Maki, when elves get hungry, we need food. We can't all subsist on cigarettes and body-shaming.

condition.saying: Hey, do you mind giving some training tips, Erufuda? You seem like you know a lot about it!

case.state: Hmmm... You're a warrior like me, so I'm sure you already know the basics. Let me think...

condition.saying: I think I heard you say something about not being able to go back home till you lost weight, well that's not going to happen till you drop those fries.

case.state: Really? You're saying french fries aren't a health food? I never would have guessed.
Thank you, Rainbow. If only I'd known that, I would have slimmed down ages ago.

condition.saying: Is she going to put down her french fries as a move?

case.state: Of course not, Emi! Strip poker means stripping clothes! Just putting something down is cheating.

condition.saying: Oh my! What big ears you have, Erufuda! Is that a physical deformity caused by excessive cholesterol intake?

case.state: My, what a big mouth you have, Cynthia!

condition.saying: Those ears! Why do they look like that? Are those the physical manifestation of an unhealthy diet?

case.state: Really, Cynthia? You think an unhealthy diet gives you... pointy ears?
Isn't it obvious from my natural beauty? I'm a Forest Elf, of course!
French fries are a holy food! A sacred treasure! Every fry unique in its own wonderful way!

state.text: I guess I'd tell them to enjoy it while they still can! I'm on a diet!
Because of my weight... I guess I'd say I hope they still like me for who I am on the inside!

case.state: Well, Nicole, I'm a Forest Elf, so naturally, I come from a beautiful enchanted forest. I'm just a little... stuck on this side of the portal.
Well, Nicole, I hope your viewers have noticed my beautiful elven ears!
There's nothing more romantic than some time alone with someone out in nature. Especially if they carry the tent!
Hmmmm... A nice dinner is a good start!
So, this is a little embarrassing, but ever since I came to the human world I've wondered if someone with nice abs would... leave an impression.
I'm so glad you asked, Nicole! Even though shoestring fries are obviously the tastiest, natural cut ones have less fat!
Probably! As long as it's not for anything too terrible.
Well, duh. I'm a beautiful Forest Elf and I'm taking my clothes off on the internet.

condition.saying: Can you cook at all? I wonder, since you like french fries so much, if there might be an elf food humans like...

case.state: I can make fries! They're way tastier than traditional elven cooking! Buncha grilled and boiled vegetables...

condition.saying: If French fries are a big deal to you, is there any elf food humans would like?

case.state:
Hmmmm...
